landing_subtitle: This application provides access to several coaching bot characters with different perspectives and coaching styles. You can create a 'life context' file to personalize conversations and update it with new insights after each session.
landing_dragDrop: Drag your .md file here, or click to browse
landing_createFile: Create a New Life Context File
landing_privacyText: If you continue as a guest, your data is processed locally in your browser. No data is stored on our servers. You are responsible for saving your file at the end of each session.
landing_error_invalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload a .md file.
landing_error_invalidHeader: Invalid file content. The file must start with the headline '# My Life Context' or '# Lebenskontext'.
landing_error_emptyFile: The selected file is empty or could not be read.
auth_subtitle: Create an account to save your progress automatically, or continue as a guest and manage your data manually.
login_error_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
register_newsletter_desc: I want to receive news and updates via email (unsubscribe anytime)
register_error_short_password: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
register_error_exists: An account with this email already exists.
register_pending_subtitle: Thank you for registering! We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please click the link to activate your account.
register_pending_spam: If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.
verifyEmail_success_subtitle: You will be logged in automatically.
verifyEmail_enter_password: Please enter your password to complete the login.
forgotPassword_subtitle: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword_warning_text: Password reset will delete all your stored life context data due to end-to-end encryption. If you still know your password, use the "Change Password" feature in the menu instead.
forgotPassword_success: If an account with this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
resetPassword_warning_text: Due to end-to-end encryption, all your stored life context data will be deleted when you reset your password. You will start with an empty context.
resetPassword_success_subtitle: You can now log in with your new password.
contextChoice_intro: You have a saved Life Context.
contextChoice_question: Would you like to continue with it or start fresh?
contextChoice_confirm_warning: Starting fresh will clear the context for this session. Your cloud data will be overwritten on the next save. We recommend downloading a backup first.
piiWarning_subtitle: The file you generated may contain Personally Identifiable Information (PII). Please review it and remove any sensitive data you are not comfortable sharing.
piiWarning_list:
Full names of real people
Email addresses, phone numbers, or physical addresses
Social security numbers or other government IDs
Financial account information
piiWarning_advice: It's best practice to use pseudonyms or general descriptions instead of real names or specific identifiers.
questionnaire_subtitle: Answer the following questions to generate a starting point for your conversations. You can skip any questions you're not comfortable with. For list-based fields, it's helpful to start each item on a new line with an asterisk (*).
questionnaire_error_name_required: Please provide a name or a calling name.
q_field_name_prompt: Your first name, nickname, or pseudonym...
q_field_sentiment_prompt: e.g., 'Feeling motivated by my new project lead, but also a bit stressed about the increased workload...'
q_section_formative_events_desc: What milestones and events have shaped you?
q_field_formative_events_prompt:
* e.g. 'Moved to a new city for university'
* e.g. 'Traveled through Southeast Asia for 3 months'
* e.g. 'Overcame a significant personal challenge'
q_section_domains_desc: The main areas of my life, each with its own goals and challenges.
q_field_situation_prompt_career: e.g., 'I'm a Project Manager leading a small team. The work is challenging and I enjoy it, but the long hours are starting to affect my home life.'
q_field_routines_prompt_career:
* I block out 'deep work' time in my calendar
* I check my emails only twice a day
q_field_goals_prompt_career:
* Get promoted to Senior Manager
* Learn a new programming language
q_field_challenges_prompt_career:
* I struggle to delegate tasks effectively
* I have a hard time saying 'no' to new requests
q_field_situation_prompt_growth: e.g., 'I've been reading a lot about leadership but struggle to apply the concepts. I'd like to be a more confident decision-maker.'
q_field_routines_prompt_growth:
* I listen to a business podcast during my commute
* I read for 30 minutes before bed
q_field_goals_prompt_growth:
* Read one non-fiction book per month
* Complete an online course on public speaking
q_field_challenges_prompt_growth:
* I get distracted easily when trying to study
* I don't make time for deliberate practice
q_field_situation_prompt_relationships: e.g., 'I'm happily married, but my partner and I don't get as much quality time together as we'd like due to our busy schedules.'
q_field_routines_prompt_relationships:
* We have a 'no-phones' dinner together
* I call my parents every Sunday
q_field_goals_prompt_relationships:
* Plan a dedicated date night with my partner once a week
* Reconnect with an old friend this month
q_field_challenges_prompt_relationships:
* I often feel too tired after work to be social
* I find it hard to open up to new people
q_field_situation_prompt_health: e.g., 'I'm fairly active and enjoy running, but stress often disrupts my sleep. I'd like to build more consistent healthy habits.'
q_field_routines_prompt_health:
* I go for a run 3 times a week
* I meditate for 10 minutes every morning
q_field_goals_prompt_health:
* Run a 10k race by the end of the year
* Get 7-8 hours of sleep per night
q_field_challenges_prompt_health:
* I have a sweet tooth and struggle with late-night snacking
* I lack motivation to work out in the winter
q_section_nextsteps_desc: Specific, actionable tasks you have committed to.
q_field_nextsteps_prompt_list:
* Talk to my manager about workload (Deadline: this week)
* Sign up for the gym (Deadline: tomorrow)
botSelection_subtitle: Each coach has a unique style. Choose one that resonates with your current needs.
botSelection_guestMessage: To unlock more coaches, please register for an account.
botSelection_registeredMessage: Unlock premium coaches by redeeming an upgrade code in the menu.
guest_limit_warning: You have reached your weekly limit of 50 messages. Register for unlimited access.
guest_limit_exceeded_message: You have reached your weekly limit of 50 messages as a guest. Register for unlimited access to all features.
update_available_desc: A new version of the app is available.
chat_welcome: Hello, I'm {{botName}}. What's on your mind today?
chat_error: I'm sorry, an error occurred while processing your request. Please try again.
chat_report_message: Report an issue with this message
chat_tapToSpeak: Voice mode is active. Tap the microphone to speak.
analyzing_subtitle: Your coach is preparing your session summary.
sessionReview_subtitle: Here's a summary of your conversation. You can apply the proposed updates to your life context.
sessionReview_g_subtitle: Here is the Life Context file generated from your interview with Gloria.
sessionReview_g_summary: This session was dedicated to setting up your life context file.
sessionReview_rating_prompt: How would you rate your conversation with {{botName}}?
sessionReview_feedback_prompt: Thank you. Could you share what could be improved?
sessionReview_feedback_prompt_optional: Great! Would you like to add a comment? (optional)
sessionReview_feedback_placeholder_optio: What went well or could be improved? (optional)
sessionReview_contact_consent: By submitting, you consent to be contacted by the developer for follow-up regarding your feedback.
sessionReview_xpBonus_formalClose: You've earned a 50 XP bonus for completing a full coaching session!
sessionReview_xpBonus_goalAccomplished: You've earned a 25 XP bonus for accomplishing one of your goals!
sessionReview_blockages_subtitle: Based on PEP by Dr. Michael Bohne, your coach noticed patterns that might be hindering your progress. This is an experimental feature for beta testers.
sessionReview_no_blockages: No specific solution blockages were identified in this session.
sessionReview_no_updates: No updates were proposed in this session.
sessionReview_preventSave_label: Don't save text changes to my cloud profile for this session.
sessionReview_preventSave_desc: Your gamification progress (XP, achievements) will still be saved to your account. Only the text changes from this session will be discarded from your cloud profile.
sessionReview_guestWarning_p1: Your session progress is not saved automatically.
sessionReview_guestWarning_p2: To keep your new insights, you must download your updated context file using the button below.
sessionReview_guestWarning_p3: If you decide to register or log in later, you will need to upload this downloaded file to restore your progress.
sessionReview_testMode_warning_desc: You are in a test session. Saving will update the context for this test run only and will not affect your personal saved data. You will be returned to the admin console after saving.
sessionReview_testMode_warning_desc_shor: Test mode: Saving is temporary and will not affect your personal data. You will be returned to the admin console.
achievement_polymath_desc: Held a session with 3 different coaches.
account_edit_profile_desc: Manage your name and newsletter settings
account_change_password_desc: Change your password for better security
account_management_footer: All changes take effect immediately. Account deletion is permanent.
profile_newsletter_desc: Receive news and updates via email
user_guide_attention_guest: Guest Users: Your progress is only saved if you manually download your Life Context file at the end of each session review. If you close the browser without downloading, your progress is lost.
user_guide_attention_registered: Registered Users: Your data is end-to-end encrypted. If you forget your password, your data cannot be recovered and will be permanently lost. We recommend making regular backups by downloading your file.
formatting_p1: You can use basic Markdown to structure your Life Context file. This helps the AI understand the document's hierarchy.
formatting_headings_p1: Use hashtags to create main sections and sub-sections.
formatting_bold_p1: A common pattern is to use bold text for a key followed by a colon.
formatting_emphasis_p1: You can emphasize text using asterisks for italics or double asterisks for bold. This is useful for highlighting key terms or ideas within a paragraph.
formatting_emphasis_code:
*This will be italic.*
**This will be bold.**
formatting_lists_p1: Use asterisks or dashes for bullet points.
formatting_lists_warning: Important: Avoid starting a bullet point directly with a bolded sub-headline (e.g., * **My Topic**: ...). This can confuse the update parser. Instead, integrate bold text naturally within your sentence (e.g., * Regarding **My Topic**: ...).
formatting_separators_p1: You can use three or more hyphens (`---`) on their own line to create a horizontal rule. This is a great way to visually separate major sections of your document.
formatting_separators_code:
## üë§ Core Profile

**I am...**: Alex

---

## üß≠ Life Domains
formatting_manual_p1: You can always manually edit the final context on the Session Review screen before saving or downloading. You can also edit the file after downloading it with a .md editor of your choice using the design elements mentioned.
formatting_manual_p2: A well-structured document leads to a better quality coaching session.
disclaimer_delete_warning: Deleting your account is a permanent action and cannot be undone. All of your data, including your encrypted life context and progress, will be irretrievably deleted.
export_data_description: Download a complete copy of all your stored personal data. This complies with your right to data portability under Art. 20 GDPR.
export_data_includes_account: Account information (email, registration date, login data)
export_data_note_encrypted: Your encrypted Life Context will be automatically decrypted for export (GDPR compliant).
export_data_gdpr_compliance: ‚úÖ GDPR compliant: Your Life Context will be decrypted and displayed in a readable format in the export, as required by Art. 15 & 20 GDPR.
export_data_format_html_desc: A beautifully formatted, easy-to-read webpage with all your data
export_data_format_json_desc: Technical format for developers and data portability
export_data_success: Your data has been successfully exported!
export_data_error: Error exporting data. Please try again.
export_data_gdpr_note: This is your legal right under Art. 15 and 20 GDPR.
redeem_subtitle: Have an upgrade code? Enter it here to unlock new features or coaches.
redeem_error_invalid: The code is invalid, expired, or has already been used.
redeem_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
redeem_info_text: For information about upgrade codes, visit
admin_runner_desc: This tool runs a pre-defined test scenario through the application's live analysis logic. It makes a real API call to the backend and displays the actual results, allowing you to quickly verify functionality. This does NOT affect your own saved user data.
admin_no_users_found: No users found matching your search.
admin_users_cannot_change_self: You cannot change your own admin status.
admin_no_codes_yet: No upgrade codes have been generated yet.
admin_tickets_no_tickets: Inbox is clear. No open support tickets.
admin_feedback_no_feedback: No feedback has been submitted yet.
admin_ratings_no_ratings: No ratings have been submitted yet.
admin_no_message_reports: No message reports have been submitted.
admin_reset_success_desc: The password for {{email}} has been reset. Please securely share the new temporary password with the user.
admin_reset_confirm_part1: Are you sure you want to reset the password for
admin_reset_confirm_warning_title: CRITICAL WARNING: DATA LOSS WILL OCCUR
admin_reset_confirm_warning_desc: This user's life context is end-to-end encrypted. Resetting the password will make their existing data permanently unreadable. Their life context file will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
changePassword_error_short: New password must be at least 6 characters long.
changePassword_error_generic: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
deleteAccount_warning: This action is final and cannot be undone. All of your data, including your profile and progress, will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount_confirmation: To confirm, please type the following text into the box below: {{requiredText}}
deleteAccount_error_mismatch: The confirmation text does not match.
deleteAccount_error_api: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again.
voiceModal_auto_desc: The best available voice for this coach's language and personality. Uses high-quality server voices for consistent quality.
voiceModal_preview_text: Hello, this is a preview of my voice.
voiceModal_no_voices_desc: This app uses the voices installed on your device. To enable voice output, you may need to add a suitable voice via your operating system's language or accessibility settings.
voiceModal_no_local_voices_desc: Your device does not have suitable local voices. You can use server voices instead.
feedback_description: Thank you for helping improve the conversation quality. Please provide details on what went wrong.
feedback_commentsPlaceholder: e.g., The response was repetitive, irrelevant, or factually incorrect...
feedback_contact_consent: You consent to be contacted by the developer via email for follow-up regarding this report.
feedback_successMessage: Thank you for helping us improve.
blockageScore_subtitle: This score indicates the potential presence of recurring thought patterns that might hinder progress. A lower score is better.
paywall_description_new: To access Meaningful Conversations, please purchase a pass or redeem an access code. Accounts created after January 1, 2026 will require an active pass.
paywall_description_expired: Your access pass for the account {{email}} has expired. To continue using Meaningful Conversations, please purchase a new pass or redeem an access code.
error_network_detailed:
Could not connect to the server at {{url}}. Please ensure the backend service is running and accessible. 

You can test this by opening the following health check URL in a new browser tab: {{url}}/api/health
scenario_simple_update_desc: A simple conversation about improving a morning routine.
scenario_simple_update_user: I want to improve my morning routine.
scenario_simple_update_bot: That's a great goal. What does your current routine look like?
scenario_simple_update_user2: I just scroll on my phone for 20 minutes. I'd like to replace that with reading a book.
scenario_complex_update_desc: A conversation about a recent promotion leading to work-life balance issues and self-doubt.
scenario_complex_update_user1: My work situation has changed recently.
scenario_complex_update_bot1: Tell me more about that. What's new?
scenario_complex_update_user2: I've been promoted to Team Lead. The work is engaging, but I find it hard to disconnect after hours.
scenario_complex_update_bot2: That sounds like a common challenge with new leadership roles. What makes disconnecting difficult for you?
scenario_complex_update_user3: I feel responsible for everything, and I worry that if I'm not available, something will go wrong. I know I need to trust my team more, but it's hard. I really should be better at delegating by now. On top of that, all this stress is making me think about my finances. I don't have any real savings plan, which is another source of anxiety.
scenario_next_steps_desc: A conversation where the user commits to a specific action for a new hobby.
scenario_next_steps_user1: I've decided to start a new hobby. I'm going to learn drawing.
scenario_next_steps_bot1: That sounds like a wonderful creative outlet. What's your first step to get started?
scenario_next_steps_user2: I will research and sign up for a local class by the end of the week.
scenario_interview_desc: A short interview with Gloria to test the context generation and formatting.
scenario_interview_chathistory_bot: Hello, to start, what name should I call you during our conversation?
scenario_interview_chathistory_bot2: Thank you, Alex. To begin, could you tell me a little about your core values?
scenario_interview_chathistory_user2: I would say my main values are integrity and continuous personal growth.
calendar_export_success: Calendar event created. Open the downloaded .ics file with your calendar app.
calendar_export_success_multiple: {{count}} calendar events created. Open the downloaded .ics files with your calendar app.
calendar_event_description: Reminder: Revisit the Meaningful Conversations app to track progress and keep your Life Context file current.
experimental_info_off_desc: The normal coaching experience without experimental adaptations. Chloe uses her standard coaching strategy without access to your personality profile.
experimental_info_dpc_desc: Uses your personality profile to adapt Chloe's coaching style in real-time.
experimental_info_dpc_feature1_desc: Chloe adapts her communication to your preferences (e.g., structured for high duration, short and rational for high distance)
experimental_info_dpc_feature2_desc: When you address topics related to your lowest score, Chloe specifically challenges you
experimental_info_dpc_feature3_desc: Every response is individually tailored to you
experimental_info_dpfl_desc: All DPC features plus continuous learning from your sessions.
experimental_info_dpfl_feature2_desc: Analyzes your word choice and topics during the session
experimental_info_dpfl_feature3_desc: Your personality profile evolves based on observed behavior
experimental_info_dpfl_feature4_desc: After each session, you can indicate how authentic you were. This keeps you in control of data quality
experimental_info_privacy_desc: All personality data and session transcripts are stored end-to-end encrypted. The server cannot read this data. You can exclude sessions from profile refinement at any time.
experimental_info_requirement: Requirement: You must complete the personality survey to use these experimental modes.
personality_survey_success_saved: PDF downloaded and profile encrypted successfully! You can now use experimental modes with Chloe.
personality_survey_error_pdf: Error creating PDF. Please try again.
profile_view_no_profile_desc: You haven't completed a personality survey yet. Start now and get access to experimental coaching modes.
profile_view_info_text: This profile is used for experimental coaching modes with Chloe. You can take a new test anytime to update your profile.
microphone_permission_denied: Microphone access denied. Please grant microphone permissions in your browser settings.
microphone_error: Microphone error. Please check if your microphone is available and not used by another application.
microphone_start_error: Failed to start microphone. Please try again.
